item.title: About Me
item.description: Work Experience Team Name Master Data Integration, SAP Labs India Tenure March 2019 - November 2022 Title Software Development Engineer + SRE Location Bangalore Technologies Programming Languages - ReasonML, NodeJS, Scala 3rd Party Software - Kafka, RabbitMQ, Redis, Grafana, Dynatrace Frameworks - Express, Bucklescript/ReScript, Cats (typelevel.

item.title: Github: Contribution Workflow
item.description: This note covers the workflow I use to contribute to open-source projects. I am using github.com for simplicity, but basic concepts are the same for all git-based VCS.

item.title: Java 11 Fundamentals: Collections
item.description: Every application requires wide variety of data structures based on your use case. Implementing every basic data structures yourself is error prone, it’s hard to get everything right.

item.title: System Design Interview by Alex Xu
item.description: Available hereðŸ‘‰ System Design Interview â€“ An insider’s guide eBook : Xu, Alex: Amazon.in: Kindle Store

item.title: The OAuth 2.0 Authorization Framework : Conceptual Overview
item.description: The OAuth 2.0 Authorization framework enables a third-party application to obtain limited access to an HTTP service, either on behalf of a resource owner by orchestrating an approval interaction between the resource owner and the HTTP service, or by allowing the third-party application to obtain access on its own behalf.
